mapper.update: UPDATE movieinfo SET con_no =#{con_no} WHERE movieCd =#{movieCd}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM movieinfo WHERE movieNm LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
SELECT distinct(con_no),movieinfo.movieposter,movieinfo.movieNm,movieinfo.movieCd FROM movieinfo INNER JOIN board USING(con_no);
select * from board inner join movieinfo using(con_no) inner join member_tbl using(mem_no) WHERE movieCd=#{movieCd};
select count(*) from board inner join movieinfo using(con_no) WHERE movieCd=#{movieCd};

select C.* from(select A.* from(select b.board_no,b.title,b.review,b.writedate,b.star_rate,m.nickname,m.mbti from board b inner join movieinfo using(con_no) inner join member_tbl m using(mem_no) WHERE movieCd=#{movieCd} order by board_no desc) A LIMIT #{totalRecord}) C LIMIT #{startRecord},#{onePageRecord};
